title: Shopping: Groceries (Usefulness 3)
description: Traveler usefulness 3/10 phrases for the Groceries subcategory within Shopping. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Why don't you buy more groceries next time?
cards.romaji: Tsugi wa mo chotto shokuryo o katta ho ga ii n ja nai?
cards.japanese: 次はもう少し食料を買ったほうがいいんじゃない？
